Pride: Yeah, Draven or Jhin fit here, though I would say that Draven probably fits a bit better (the sin of pride is usually displayed as vanity in most cases, and Draven fits that far better than Jhin).

Greed: I think Gangplank or Sivir would fit better here than Cho.  Cho is very solidly gluttony, not greed, while GP is a ruthless pirate and Sivir is a mercenary motivated only by money.  Kench could fit as well, as he's pretty much called out as a manifestation of greed.

Lost: Evelynn all the way, she's a succubus (in the modern sense, not the classical sense).

Envy: Amumu might fit, but I think Galio could just as well, as he seems to be pretty envious of the living, and Viktor might too (for the same reason the Borg could be considered a manifestation of envy).

Gluttony: Tahm Kench would make sense, as would Cho or possibly even Kog'Maw or Vel'Koz (he has a case of gluttony focused on Knowledge.

Wrath: Renekton is close, but I'd say he's more anger than wrath.  Kalista fits perfectly though.

Sloth: Zoe.  She makes portals just to avoid having to walk, and doesn't take anything seriously.
